text: Colostethus furviventris is a frog. It lives in Colombia. This frog lives on the dead leaves on the ground in cloud forests. Scientists saw the frog 1500 meters above sea level. One of the places this frog lives is a protected park: Parque Nacional Natural Paramillo. Scientists do not know if this frog is in danger of dying out. ==References== Category:Frogs of South America Category:Poison dart frogs
title: Colostethus furviventris
